about_the_game:
Welcome to Garden Renovator, a fun sim game where you can experience life of a gardener who's inbox is full of interesting gardening commisions! Your new clients are aware of your expertise and will pay top dollar for some of your boldest and most fancy designs!


Becoming the most booked gardener in the country is quite an achievement, so it's pretty clear you'll need to live up to your name! Fortunately for you, you're equipped with all the tools you need to create a lasting impression on your customers. Don't forget to have fun while you're at it!


Anybody can plant a tree (and everybody sholud do so) but only few can create beautiful designs using living organisms. Lucky you, because you're one of those people! With Flowerbed Creation Interface (and more!) you're able to achieve any crazy (and/or) amazing design you can imagine!


"What about all that money I'll be earning?" you ask?

As any keen gardener you should always cultivate your own garden of course! With the money, you'll be able to buy land and design it however you deem fit!
Spend it on various unlockable plants, tools and buildings! Make yourself feel at home! After you're done with your kingdom, don't forget to share your work with other gardeners!
detailed_description:
Welcome to Garden Renovator, a fun sim game where you can experience life of a gardener who's inbox is full of interesting gardening commisions! Your new clients are aware of your expertise and will pay top dollar for some of your boldest and most fancy designs!


Becoming the most booked gardener in the country is quite an achievement, so it's pretty clear you'll need to live up to your name! Fortunately for you, you're equipped with all the tools you need to create a lasting impression on your customers. Don't forget to have fun while you're at it!


Anybody can plant a tree (and everybody sholud do so) but only few can create beautiful designs using living organisms. Lucky you, because you're one of those people! With Flowerbed Creation Interface (and more!) you're able to achieve any crazy (and/or) amazing design you can imagine!


"What about all that money I'll be earning?" you ask?

As any keen gardener you should always cultivate your own garden of course! With the money, you'll be able to buy land and design it however you deem fit!
Spend it on various unlockable plants, tools and buildings! Make yourself feel at home! After you're done with your kingdom, don't forget to share your work with other gardeners!
name: Garden Renovator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590k / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 4GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device

short_description: Garden Renovator is an engaging simulator allowing you to take on the mantle of a professional gardener. Use various fun tools to your advantage and make your clients happy with your garden designs!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
